scripts.staging-fs: export NODE_ENV=staging || SET "NODE_ENV=staging" && export NODE_STORAGE=fs || SET "NODE_STORAGE=fs" && node index.js
scripts.staging-mongo-native: export NODE_ENV=staging || SET "NODE_ENV=staging" && export NODE_STORAGE=mongo-native || SET "NODE_STORAGE=mongo-native" && node index.js
scripts.testing-fs: export NODE_ENV=testing || SET "NODE_ENV=testing" && export NODE_STORAGE=fs || SET "NODE_STORAGE=fs" && node test/index.js
scripts.testing-mongo-native: export NODE_ENV=testing || SET "NODE_ENV=testing" && export NODE_STORAGE=mongo-native || SET "NODE_STORAGE=mongo-native" && node test/index.js
